overview: This is a previously banned film from Taiwan's early porn stars. It was filmed on the spot in Riyuetan, Taiwan. The scenery is beautiful, the lake scenery and mountains are pleasant, and the tea garden and nursery are everywhere. It describes the rural people, the love desire of young men and women, and the scene of making love wherever you like. The plot is light and humorous. It is very rural flavor with the performance of Taiwan's early old male stars and beautiful female stars. It can relieve your worries for a while Forget it, and see why it was banned by the early government
title: I Love You Baby
